title: nf-core/rarevariantburden pipeline parameters
description: This pipeline include tools for performing consistent summary count based rare variant burden test, which is useful when we only have sequenced cases data, no control data; here we can compare the cases against public summary count data, such as gnomAD data

inputs.title: Inputs
inputs.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved.

caseSample.description: One column text file containing list of samples, one sample ID per line.

controlDataFolder.description: Input files needed for the pipeline from the control dataset, for now we support 3 gnomAD datasets as control, gnomADv2exome, gnomADv4.1exome, gnomADv4.1genome.

annovarFolder.description: Resource folder for the annotation tool Annovar.

vepFolder.description: Resource folder for the annotation tool VEP.

build.description: Reference genome build version, allowed values are "GRCh37", "GRCh38". Default value: "GRCh37""

gnomADVersion.description: gnomAD version, allowed values are "v2exome", "v4exome", "v4genome" (for GRCh37 data use "v2exome", for GRCh38, use "v4exome" or "v4genome"). Default value: "v2exome""

caseBed.description: Bed file containing good coverage positions from case vcf files where 90% samples have coverage >= 10.

addVEP.description: If you want to add VEP annotation, you need to put "T" for this parameter. Default: "F", meaning do not run VEP annotaion, only run Annovar.

casePopulation.description: File containing estimation of the population/ethnicity of case samples using gnomAD classifier, optional, if not specified nextflow app will estimate the population using gnomAD classifier.

groupFunctionConfig.description: An optional R file with functions or a tab separated two column text file defining the variants of interest

groupColumn.description: The column header used to pull Gene name from annotation file

variantGroup.description: A specified variant group to use for test or a self defined function to define the variants of interest

AFMax.description: The maximum of the alternate allele frequency, for gnomADv2exome, we used 0.0001, for gnomADv4.1genome and v4.1exome, we used 0.0005

REVELThreshold.description: The minimum REVEL score for pathogenic missense variants

topK.description: Top K genes for generating variant-sample list

caseVCFFileList.description: If you split you joined called VCF file by chromosome, you can supply the VCF file list here

caseAnnotatedVCFFileList.description: Pre-annotated case VCF files, you can use the pre-annotated case VCF files to skip the annotation steps in the pipeline

caseGenotypeGDSFileList.description: GDS converted genotype case VCF files, you can use it to skip the genotype GDS conversion steps in the pipeline

caseAnnotationGDSFileList.description: GDS converted annotated case VCF files, you can use it to skip the annotation GDS conversion steps in the pipeline
